text: If you have Hulu and are looking for a great binge, I highly recommend The Great. It's a farce and it's really funny and sexy, super-cute and sad, in the same way that Don't Look Up is sad. Human nature is all fucked up. That seems to be a recurring theme. Heh. But it is so much fun, kind of like the way Beetlejuice is fun -- and there are two full seasons so there's a lot to binge. Huzzah!
